"The only time I've done that... / ...should learn to STFU. "

Wow, 2Crazy... That is some serious horseshit. Laughable sophistry. Mug was right - you're a spammer (or, you were in that instance, at least). Littering up other people's ups with spam redirecting people to your own stuff is shamefully self-serving. He had every right to call you on it - regardless of whether or not he'd uploaded anything using that screen name.

Having said that, thx for all the ups.... You've put up some quality stuff, and it's all appreciated.
